Dialogue.text: I have a mission for you, but haha... I have accidentally locked my notes in my briefcase
Dialogue.Speaker: Doodle

Dialogue.text: it requires a pattern passcode to unlock it. can you help me figure it out?
Dialogue.Speaker: Doodle

Dialogue.text:
But it's really really important! 
 Please? Please please?
Dialogue.Speaker: Doodle

Dialogue.text:
Okay... 
 We need to match the missing piece that fits the pattern
Dialogue.Speaker: Doodle

Dialogue.text: First, we study the pattern from the above images!
Dialogue.Speaker: Doodle

Dialogue.text: Then, pick the correct option from below
Dialogue.Speaker: Doodle

Dialogue.text: Great job kids! You're a life saver!
Dialogue.Speaker: Doodle
